name: 911 Airport Rescue 2 Free
description:
The alarm sounds, an airplane is having a problem. The airport needs your help. Race your car to the scene of the accident as fast as possible. When you arrive to the accident, you must decide which emergency vehicle to drive. You can choose between the ambulance, fire truck, police car, construction vehicle to remove snow and garbage, sports car, and tow truck. Be the hero!
REAL WORKING AIRPORT - Watch out for the planes during takeoff and landing!
Simulator Game Feature:
--Realistic Airport 911 Emergency Scenarios
--Super fun cut scenes will be shown before certain missions
--Real Police Radio Chatter
--Race to the scene the of the big crash in your rescue car
--You choose the best rescue action to take
--Drive a Firetruck Ambulance, Tow Truck, or Backup Cop Car
--High Quality 3D graphics and fun game play
--Rain and Snow Scenarios

Missions include towing an airplane, airplane parking, removing snow from the runway, putting out fires, helping a helicopter, and catching criminals.

Everything you want to see in a virtual driving or 3D racing simulator. Its awesomely addictive.
If you are looking for a high quality 911 rescue simulator game, look no further.
